title: Chinese Painting and Calligraphy (Art Ebook).pdf

Dover Publications | 1978 | ISBN 0486237079 | English | 196 pages | PDF | 37.5 MB


Brush and ink Ã¢â‚¬â€ the required path to the "three perfections" of Chinese art Ã¢â‚¬â€ painting, calligraphy, poetry. The complex path to Chinese art, through painting and calligraphy(and ultimately poetry), is revealed through a lucidly described tour of the John M. Crawford, Jr. collection of Chinese visual art, conducted by the scholar, collector and calligrapher Wan-go Weng. In 109 photographs of 69 works of art, Chinese Painting and Calligraphy surveys the living world of Chinese art and artists from the Northern Sung dynasty (960-1127) to the early Ch'ing (1644-1911)
